name: DAIKIN Europe NV
membership: Daikin Europe NV is member of the following EU associations : EPEE, APPLiA, JBCE, EHI, EHPA, REHVA, EuroACE, Eurovent, EVIA
goal: Monitor EU-legislation related to environment, energy, taxation, ecolabel-programmes, resource-efficiency, buildings performance, recycling, refrigerants
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Institutional affairs, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
-Climate and Energy related policies and legislations
-Environmental related policies and legislations
